data.name: TextPageStyle
desc: represents a page style for a text document.
This service extends the service com.sun.star.style.PageStyle with specific properties for text documents.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.0

properties.name: FooterText
desc: contains the interface to the text of the footer.

properties.name: FooterTextFirst
desc: contains the interface to the text of the footer of a first page.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.0

properties.name: FooterTextLeft
desc: contains the interface to the text of the footer of a left page.

properties.name: FooterTextRight
desc: contains the interface to the text of the footer of a right page.

properties.name: FootnoteHeight
desc: contains the maximum height of the footnote area (in 1/100 mm).
If set to zero, the height of the current page is used as limit.

properties.name: FootnoteLineAdjust
desc: contains the adjustment of the separator line between the text and the footnote area.

properties.name: FootnoteLineColor
desc: contains the color of the separator line between the text and the footnote area.

properties.name: FootnoteLineDistance
desc: contains the distance between the footnote area and the separator line between the text and the footnote area (in 1/100 mm).

properties.name: FootnoteLineRelativeWidth
desc: contains the relative width of the separator line between the text and the footnote area (in percent).

properties.name: FootnoteLineTextDistance
desc: contains the distance between the text and the separator line between the text and the footnote area (in 1/100 mm).

properties.name: FootnoteLineWeight
desc: contains the weight of the separator line between the text and the footnote area (in 1/100 mm).

properties.name: HeaderText
desc: contains the interface to the text of the header.

properties.name: HeaderTextFirst
desc: contains the interface to the text of the header of first pages.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.0

properties.name: HeaderTextLeft
desc: contains the interface to the text of the header of left pages.

properties.name: HeaderTextRight
desc: contains the interface to the text of the header of right pages.

properties.name: RegisterModeActive
desc: determines whether the register mode is active on that page.

properties.name: RegisterParagraphStyle
desc: contains the name of the paragraph style that is used as reference of the register mode.

properties.name: TextColumns
desc: contains the column settings of the page.
